title: Lord of Magic - Novel Updates
tags: Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Multiple Transported Individuals   Past Plays a Big Role   Survival Game   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Sancheon
description:
From the author of “2000 Years of Magic History in My Head”:

Archmage Akan of the Macedonian continent has fallen to Korea due to a magic experiment failure!

And ten years later…

“Welcome to the other world.”

The world began to change.>
